title: (x) Script capital A - Flemish Script {Evan (self), Mike Y}
content:
Script Capital A - please ID. Thank you.

author: evan

comments.content: ID’d my own font - Flemish Script. Thanks anyway.

Not that it matters, but I might have won that race if I didn’t have to type in all the HTML commands to make the link in a new page. Glad you ID’d your font, anyhow.  
- Mike Yanega
Mike I like your mark but what is the shape above the MY combination.
Thanks Ives! Did you have your super powers restored or are you still a mortal?
